playn.core

Interface Touch.LayerListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Touch.LayerAdapter
    Enclosing interface:
    Touch

    public static interface Touch.LayerListener
    An interface for listening to touch events that interact with a single layer. See Layer.addListener(Touch.LayerListener).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onTouchCancel(Touch.Event touch)
      Called when a touch, that started out hitting the listening layer, is canceled.
      void onTouchEnd(Touch.Event touch)
      Called when a touch, that started out hitting the listening layer, ends.
      void onTouchMove(Touch.Event touch)
      Called when a touch, that started out hitting the listening layer, moves.
      void onTouchStart(Touch.Event touch)
      Called when a touch starts that hits this layer.

    • Method Detail

      • onTouchStart

        void onTouchStart(Touch.Event touch)
        Called when a touch starts that hits this layer.

      • onTouchMove

        void onTouchMove(Touch.Event touch)
        Called when a touch, that started out hitting the listening layer, moves.

      • onTouchEnd

        void onTouchEnd(Touch.Event touch)
        Called when a touch, that started out hitting the listening layer, ends.

      • onTouchCancel

        void onTouchCancel(Touch.Event touch)
        Called when a touch, that started out hitting the listening layer, is canceled. This happens when Touch.cancelLayerTouches(playn.core.Layer) is called, or it can be initiated by the OS. Note: the coordinates of this event will be (0, 0) if initiated by Touch.cancelLayerTouches(playn.core.Layer).
